title: Molly-Mae Hague and Tommy Fury make a stunning arrival at Pride Of Britain
text:
The video will start in 8 Cancel

Click to play Tap to play

Get the biggest Daily Love Island stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

It's that time of year again when we celebrate the nation's unsung heroes at the Pride of Britain Awards 2019.

Molly-Mae Hague and Tommy Fury looked every inch the power couple as they stepped out at the Pride Of Britain Awards tonight.

The social media influencer, 20, looked pretty in pink as she donned a floor-length one shouldered gown with intricate neckline detailing.

The star also wore a statement black scrunchie in her famously blonde tresses.

(Image: David Fisher/REX)

Molly-Mae's Love Island beau Tommy Fury also looked charming for the event as he donned a suave navy blazer with velvet detailing.

The boxing star also rocked a smart bow tie for the swanky awards night.

The Pride of Britain Awards is one of the hottest tickets on the showbiz calendar as celebs gather to celebrate the country's unsung heroes.

(Image: David Fisher/REX)

(Image: Doug Peters/EMPICS Entertainment)

Carol Vorderman will be hosting the awards tonight, while Prince Charles will be on hand to help honour the Pride of Britain winners .

Pride of Britain will be on ITV on Tuesday 5 November, from 8pm until 10pm.

The Daily Mirror Pride of Britain Awards, in partnership with TSB, will broadcast on ITV on 5th November at 8pm.
description: The Love Island power couple led the star-studded arrivals at the Pride Of Britain Awards
